svg.aria-label: CE thermal stability and r_o impact
svg.title: CE Stability & r_o Impact
svg.desc: Explains role of emitter resistor for thermal stability and effect of finite r_o on gain and load line.

g.text: If I_C rises (β drift/temperature) → V_E rises → V_BE reduces → I_C pulled back
Choose RE to set VE ~ 5–15% of VCC for bias robustness; bypass for AC gain if needed
With r_o, small‑signal gain: A_v ≈ −g_m (R_C ∥ R_L ∥ r_o)
Load line not perfectly horizontal; output resistance reduces gain and increases distortion near swing limits
